verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, There shall none be \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* for the \w dead|strong="H5315"\w* among his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:

But for his \w kin|strong="H7607"\w*, that is \w near|strong="H7138"\w* unto him, \add that is\add*, for his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, and for his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and for his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and for his \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, and for his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*,

And for his \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* a \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w*, that is \w nigh|strong="H7138"\w* unto him, which hath had no \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*; for her may he be \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*.

\add But\add* he shall not \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* himself, \add being\add* a chief \w man|strong="H1167"\w* among his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, to \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* himself.\f + \fr 21.4 \ft he…: or, being an husband among his people, he shall not defile himself for his wife, etc\f*

They shall not \w make|strong="H7139"\w* \w baldness|strong="H7144"\w* upon their \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, neither shall they shave \w off|strong="H1548"\w* the \w corner|strong="H6285"\w* of their \w beard|strong="H2206"\w*, nor \w make|strong="H8295"\w* any \w cuttings|strong="H8296"\w* in their \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

They shall be \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and not \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for the \w offerings|strong="H0801"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, \add and\add* the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, they do \w offer|strong="H7126"\w*: therefore they shall be \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*.

They shall not \w take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \add that is\add* a \w whore|strong="H2181"\w*, or \w profane|strong="H2491"\w*; neither shall they \w take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* put \w away|strong="H1644"\w* from her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*: for he \add is\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* unto his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Thou shalt \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* him therefore; for he \w offereth|strong="H7126"\w* the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: he shall be \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* unto thee: for I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* you, \add am\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*.

¶ And the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, if she \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* herself by playing the \w whore|strong="H2181"\w*, she \w profaneth|strong="H2490"\w* her \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: she shall be \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

And \add he that is\add* the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* among his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, upon whose \w head|strong="H7218"\w* the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* was \w poured|strong="H3332"\w*, and that is \w consecrated|strong="H4390"\w* to \w put|strong="H3847"\w* on the \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, shall not \w uncover|strong="H6544"\w* his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, nor \w rend|strong="H6533"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*;

Neither shall he go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to any \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w body|strong="H5315"\w*, nor \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* himself for his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, or for his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*;

Neither shall he go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, nor \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* of his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; for the \w crown|strong="H5145"\w* of the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* of his \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* upon him: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
And he shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* in her \w virginity|strong="H1331"\w*.

A \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, or a divorced \w woman|strong="H1644"\w*, or \w profane|strong="H2491"\w*, \add or\add* an \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, these shall he not \w take|strong="H3947"\w*: but he shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* of his own \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.
Neither shall he \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* among his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: for I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* do \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* him.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Whosoever|strong="H0376"\w* \add he be\add* of thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* in their \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* that hath \add any\add* \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*, let him not \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* to \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 21.17 \ft bread: or, food\f*

For whatsoever \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add he be\add* that hath a \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*, he shall not \w approach|strong="H7126"\w*: a \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, or a \w lame|strong="H6455"\w*, or he that hath a flat \w nose|strong="H2763"\w*, or any thing \w superfluous|strong="H8311"\w*,
Or a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that is \w brokenfooted|strong="H7667"\w*, or \w brokenhanded|strong="H7667"\w*,

Or \w crookbackt|strong="H1384"\w*, or a \w dwarf|strong="H1851"\w*, or that hath a \w blemish|strong="H8400"\w* in his \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*, or be \w scurvy|strong="H1618"\w*, or \w scabbed|strong="H3217"\w*, or hath his \w stones|strong="H0810"\w* \w broken|strong="H4790"\w*;\f + \fr 21.20 \ft a dwarf: or, too slender\f*

No \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that hath a \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w* of the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall come \w nigh|strong="H5066"\w* to \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* the \w offerings|strong="H0801"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*: he hath a \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*; he shall not come \w nigh|strong="H5066"\w* to \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

He shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add both\add* of the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*, and of the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.

Only he shall not go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w*, nor come \w nigh|strong="H5066"\w* unto the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, because he hath a \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*; that he \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* not my \w sanctuaries|strong="H4720"\w*: for I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* do \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* them.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and to his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and unto all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
